<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\file Pass to transform &lt;256 x i32&gt; load/store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &lt;256 x i32&gt; is bitcasted to x86&#95;amx on X86, and AMX instruction set only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// provides simple operation on x86&#95;amx. The basic elementwise operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is not supported by AMX. Since x86&#95;amx is bitcasted from vector &lt;256 x i32&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and only AMX intrinsics can operate on the type, we need transform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// load/store &lt;256 x i32&gt; instruction to AMX load/store. If the bitcast can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not be combined with load/store, we transform the bitcast to amx load/store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and &lt;256 x i32&gt; store/load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If Front End not use O0 but the Mid/Back end use O0, (e.g. &quot;Clang -O2 -S</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// -emit-llvm t.c&quot; + &quot;llc t.ll&quot;) we should make sure the amx data is volatile,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// because that is necessary for AMX fast register allocation. (In Fast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// registera allocation, register will be allocated before spill/reload, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// there is no additional register for amx to identify the step in spill.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The volatileTileData() will handle this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ----------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | def %td = ...                                          |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | ...                                                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | &quot;use %td&quot;                                              |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ----------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will transfer to --&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ----------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | def %td = ...                                          |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | call void @llvm.x86.tilestored64.internal(mem, %td)    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | ...                                                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | %td2 = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tileloadd64.internal(mem)|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | &quot;use %td2&quot;                                             |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ----------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86-h">X86.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When it is not a const value and it is not a function argument, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create Row after the definition of V instead of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before II. For example, II is %118, we try to getshape for %117:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %117 = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.cast.vector.to.tile.v256i32(&lt;256 x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   i32&gt; %115).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %118 = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tdpbf16ps.internal(i16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %104, i16 %105, i16 %106, x86&#95;amx %110, x86&#95;amx %114, x86&#95;amx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %117).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we create %row = udiv i16 %106, 4 before %118(aka. II), then its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definition is after its user(new tileload for %117).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So, the best choice is to create %row right after the definition of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %106.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/shapecalculator/#a860edc537080dfa1a9a28aed98922a2d"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;Value &#42;, Value &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/shapecalculator/#acd2dda16ed338fb2caedac50b664523e">ShapeCalculator::getShape</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;Phi) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpNo = U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use/#a541187eb976df2189b40b3f62ed2cee0">getOperandNo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;V = U.getUser();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO We don&#39;t traverse all users. To make the algorithm simple, here we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just traverse the first user. If we can find shape, then return the shape,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise just return nullptr and the optimization for undef/zero will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// abandoned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a040e84d289f1612a27fe09504681a491">isAMXCast</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Smilar with volatileTileNonPHI, this function only handle PHI Nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and their related AMX intrinsics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) PHI Def should change to tileload.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) PHI Incoming Values should tilestored in just after their def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) The mem of these tileload and tilestores should be same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb&#95;dom:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %bool.cond, label %if.else, label %if.then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if.then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   def %t0 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   use %t0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %if.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if.else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   def %t1 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %if.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if.end:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %td = phi x86&#95;amx &#91; %t1, %if.else &#93;, &#91; %t0, %if.then &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   use %td</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb&#95;entry:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %mem = alloca &lt;256 x i32&gt;, align 1024                  &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb&#95;dom:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %bool.cond, label %if.else, label %if.then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if.then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   def %t0 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void @llvm.x86.tilestored64.internal(mem, %t0)    &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %t0&#96; = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tileloadd64.internal(mem)&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   use %t0&#96;                                               &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %if.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if.else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   def %t1 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void @llvm.x86.tilestored64.internal(mem, %t1)    &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %if.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if.end:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %td = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tileloadd64.internal(mem) &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   use %td</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86loweramxtype-cpp-/x86volatiletiledata/#a4f767b83cb14d5a70423c68254648c18"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86loweramxtype-cpp-/x86volatiletiledata/#a4f767b83cb14d5a70423c68254648c18">X86VolatileTileData::volatileTilePHI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store the defined tile and load it before use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All its users are not PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// def %td = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;use %td&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// def %td = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call void @llvm.x86.tilestored64.internal(mem, %td)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %td2 = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tileloadd64.internal(mem)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;use %td2&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86loweramxtype-cpp-/x86volatiletiledata/#ae77aa371550f54db6fe53ff0459c700d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86loweramxtype-cpp-/x86volatiletiledata/#ae77aa371550f54db6fe53ff0459c700d">X86VolatileTileData::volatileTileNonPHI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Volatile Tile Model:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) All the uses of tile data comes from tileload in time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) All the defs of tile data tilestore into mem immediately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --------------------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %t1 = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tileloadd64.internal(m, k, ...)          key</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %t2 = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tileloadd64.internal(k, n, ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %t3 = call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tileloadd64.internal(m, n, ...)          amx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %td = tail call x86&#95;amx @llvm.x86.tdpbssd.internal(m, n, k, t1, t2, t3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call void @llvm.x86.tilestored64.internal(... td)                     area</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --------------------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) No terminator, call or other amx instructions in the key amx area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86loweramxtype-cpp-/x86volatiletiledata/#aeb433ec9d181eb8f489c857b23c55535"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86loweramxtype-cpp-/x86volatiletiledata/#aeb433ec9d181eb8f489c857b23c55535">X86VolatileTileData::volatileTileData</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TyA != DestTy || TyB != SrcTy)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(V)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As long as the user is another old PHI node, then even if we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rewrite it, the PHI web we&#39;re considering won&#39;t have any users</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outside itself, so it&#39;ll be dead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bb.0:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bb.1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %1 = amxcast ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bb.2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %goodphi = phi %0, %1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %3 = amxcast %goodphi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bb.3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %goodphi2 = phi %0, %goodphi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %4 = amxcast %goodphi2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When optimizeAMXCastFromPhi process %3 and %goodphi, %goodphi2 is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outside the phi-web, so the combination stop When</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimizeAMXCastFromPhi process %4 and %goodphi2, the optimization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OldPhiNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#abb03e3b6c4fd937936a13afe4f60d291">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
